title: Finra Seeks to Extend Holds on Accounts to Combat Elder Fraud
description: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority has proposed rule changes aimed at combating investment scams — particularly against senior citizens — in part by empowering broker-dealers to extend delays on suspicious transactions.
content: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority has proposed rule changes aimed at combating investment scams — particularly against senior citizens — in part by empowering broker-dealers to extend delays on suspicious transactions.
